runs.comm: starts his first game with a wide down the leg side

almost run out but they get quite a few overthrows in the end. It was pushed to left of backward point .. Karthk set off for the single and Vijay responded but hello Karthik suddenly panics and turns back. Drama. AB with the sliding dive and he doesn't realise the situation. Both men almost at the same end but he has a shy at the striker's end. Mistake. And overthrows as well.

It kicked up short of length outside off stump and straightened a touch. VIjay stabs out at it, bat away from the body, and the ball catches the edge. So after all that drama in the previous delivery, SA have picked up a wicket this time around.
banged in short as Raina has a problem with it .. this time he hops to push it to the off side
another kicking up from short of length, Raina pushes away from the body and gets the ball down to third man. Fora  brief while, the slip cordon would have been excited
leans forward to push the length delivery to the on side
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
stays back to punch a length delivery to mid-off.
And more problems for Raina. Peach of a delivery in the zone outside off stump and kicking away. Raina hops back and pushes out at it and is lucky not to edge it
this time he gets forward to punch the length delivery through covers
again that hop back to his stump and he nudges this one past square-leg
lovely full delivery that curves away ever so late, DK pushes out on to his front foot and squeezes the ball to extra cover
Steyn hits the length, Raina prefers to jump back and defend it to the off side
down the leg side and India move to double figures
comes in from back of length, there is some movement on offer, Karthik tries to drive on the up and edges it to his pad and the ball pops up on the leg side
Lovely change-up of the length here. This one is full and outside off stump line, Karthik is caught in the crease and has a big flash at it. Beaten comprehensively
gets forward quickly this time and defends to the on side
wider outside off stump, left alone
moves in from just outside off stump, Karthik plays a compact forward defensive stroke
It kicked up from short of length outside off stump and Karthik lifts his front leg in the air and plays a neat-looking cut over point
moves to the on side and tries to punch on the up but doesn't quite ride the bounce well and the ball rolls to mid-on
fuller and Raina doesn't move forward, pushes the ball to left of mid-on
inside-edged to the fine-leg boundary. He moves down the wicket, Albie dragged back the length and got it to cut in to Karthik who stabbed it off the inner edge past the diving Boucher
hurls it fuller and outside off, Karthik went for the big expansive shot over covers but no wood on leather as the ball curves away
he leans forward to play a nice off drive past mid-off
on the off stump line, pushed out to the off side

caught at mid-off but it's a no ball Raina moves outside leg but yet again finds no power in the shot. He was unable to adjust to the extra bounce and couldn't knife through the line .. he ended up lobbing it towards mid-off and the fielder rushed in to take a good diving 'catch'
opens his stance and heaves it over midwicket. He doesn't quite connect well and will pick up couple of runs
tapped wide of backward point
gets forward to work it wide of midwicket
stays back to push a short-of-length delivery to covers
moves outside leg but he is pinned down by a nice shortish delivery, Raina jabs it out to the off side
slips to the pads and Raina unfurls the leg glance to collect a boundary
runs it down to third man for a single
tapped past point for a single
Moves down the track and tries to play the big shot over mid-on but is unable to clear it. Not much wood on leather on the ball. It was dug in short and he wasn't quite able to ride the bounce.
jumps outside off stump, jabbed  out to the off side
moves outside leg and tries to lift it over mid-off but edges it over the vacant slip cordon
on the middle and leg stump line, pushed out to the off side
short in length on the middle stump line, tapped to the on side
on the off and middle line, defended towards the non striker
angling away from Yuvraj who pokes it at with an open face of the bat and the ball runs down to third man
on the off stump line, pushed towards mid-off
moves away from short of length outside off, Raina tries to punch it on the up but the ball flies through the bat and pad gap
off cutter from outside leg stump, dabbed to the on side
banged in short and Yuvraj allows it to sail past his head
short of length outside off, Yuvraj tries to pull it away and ends up flat-batting it past the non striker
short in length, around the off stump, punched through extra cover
outside off stump, steered to deep point
short in length and outside off, cuts it up and over .. towards deep point
full around the off stump line, off driven to right of long-off
Even better this time. He backed away and played inside-out well wide of long-off. Neat-looking off drive there.
on the middle stump line, almost short-arm jabbed it past short midwicket..
tries the reverse sweep but doesn't connect properly
brings up the first six with the slog sweep. He went down on his knee to swing it over deep square-leg region
and plays a forward defensive shot this time
Thwack! He moved outside leg stump, stays well back inside the crease, and lifts it over wide long-on boundary.
jumps outside off stump from short of length, guided to backward point
hops to stab the short-of-length delivery uppishly but short of the diving Kallis
moves outside leg to steer the short-of-length delivery to deep point
moves towards leg side and goes for the big heave-ho. He doesn't connect well but the ball lands safely front of deep midwicket fielder
moves outside leg again and this time carves it over the off-side field  ... towards deep cover region

moves down the track and gets a slower one .. which he pushes it wide of covers where Smith makes a fine diving stop and throws the ball back at the striker's end. Raina had to get back in a hurry and he dived to get back to his crease
low full toss outside off stump, Raina maintains his balance, crouches a touch to play a deftly sliced square drive
slower one in the zone outside off, Raina tries to dab it to third man but makes no contact
gets outside leg and works it towards deep midwicket
walks down the track and on drives to long-on
Deliciously played pick-up shot over backward square-leg boundary. It was full and on the legs and Yuvraj played a stylish flick shot to send the white ball soaring over the boundary
on the pads, turned past square-leg
short in length around off stump, punched through the off side
moves outside leg and dabs it past point
off cutter outside off stump, chopped to backward point
banged in short and it sails well over Yuvraj
Fab strike. It was banged in short and Yuvraj plays the short-arm pull to perfection. And he glares at Kallis
just outside off stump, cuts it to right of third man
fullish, around off stump, Yuvraj edges the intended off drive to his pad
backs away outside leg and wallops a full-pitched delivery over covers. Thump!
stays back to a really full delivery and drives it uppishly towards long-on
moves outside leg, Steyn follows him with a slower one which has been nudged past square-leg
another slower one, Yuvraj mistimes the intended forcing shot and the ball rolls back to the bowler
And the third slower one in a row! Full and outside off, Yuvraj edges the off drive to his pads
Ah .. nicely done. for a moment he seemed cramped up by a short of length delivery at the body but he plays a nice short-arm pull to backward square-leg boundary
run out of Raina missed by AB It went of Yuvraj's pad to the off side .. RAina had charged across far too much. AB picked the ball and missed the stumps at the non-striker's end
shortish delivery at the body, Yuvraj ends up almost lapping it  straight to fine-leg but it lands safely ahead of the fielder
gets forward to off drive for a single
moves outside leg and hits it down to long-off
moves outside leg.. full and straight on the middle, pushed out to covers for a quick single
reaches his fifty with a square drive to deep point
outside off stump, goes past the attempted cut
moves outside leg and drags the slower one to deep square-leg region
backs away to the leg side and unfurls a wristy sliced square-drive to backward point boundary
moves outside leg, slower one arrives, Raina tries to slog it over on-side boundary but makes no contact
another slower one , pushed out to Smith at covers
full pitched on the off stump line , driven to long-off
low full toss, Yuvraj ends up slicing it towards long-off .. makes contact with the bottom of the bat
Thump. Raina picks the slower one and swings it high over square-leg boundary
moves outside leg to slice the full delivery to third man
moves outside leg to play the big shot but ends up carving the low full toss straight up .. Smith moves from midwicket position to take it at mid-on
Blast! full toss and it has been smashed to the cow corner. Whack!
outside off stump, run down to third man
short in length and down the leg side
fuller, straighter, edged away for a single
on the middle and leg, turned wide of midwicket
Poor delivery. Fullish and just outside leg stump and Raina plays the pick-up shot over short fine-leg
overpitched on the off and middle, dragged down to long-on
Almost done in by the bouncer. Yusuf goes for the pull but the ball gets big on him and he top edges it  over the stumps at the other end!
Boom. He clears the front foot and thumps the short-of-length delivery that didn't climb much over midwicket boundary
low full toss, mistimes it to long-on
full pitched delivery has vanished to the wide long-on boundary. Raina stays well back inside the crease, creates his own length, opens his stance and whacks it to the on-side boundary
More flamboyance. He carves this one, a full toss, over extra cover region. The crowd love it.
He keeps a still head and drills this length delivery to the straight boundary. Violence.
What a fabulicious shot! He went down on his knee and lifted the full-length delivery over long-off. As if he was playing a spinner. Great to watch.
kicks up from short of length, dabbed to third man
driven down to long-off for a single
slower one outside off stump, short in length as well, Yusuf had moved outside leg, had to wait for the ball to arrive and flat batted it to deep cover fielder
really full length delivery outside off, Raina crouches to slice it away to the off side
banged in short, pulled to left of deep midwicket where Duminy makes a fine stop
nudges this one to square-leg for a single.
length delivery on the off stump line and Dhoni thrashes it to wide long-on boundary.
well outside off stump, hit down to sweeper cover

Only the third batsman to have hit a T20 hundred. Full pitched on the off and middle and Raina wallops it over midwicket boundary. Fierce Thump! He knew that it was a six as soon as he hit it.  A devilishly entertaining knock.
He is gone now, holing out near the straight boundary. He got a tad too much under the ball and the fielder rushed in from long-on towards his right to collect it
short in length, clubbed to long-on .. Steyn fires the throw at the striker's end but Boucher doesn't collect it cleanly .. run out chance of Dhoni missed.
Thunder! Fullish outside off stump and Dhoni uses his bottom-hand to lift it over long-on.
